Subject: Megastorm's Triumph

::Galvatron comes to and finds himself in his base being repaired by 
Autojetter.  Megastorm is there, and a pang of jealousy flooded Galvatron's 
circuits as he sees him wiping mech fluid from his hands::
Megastorm: Some stupid maximal came by here, killed him easily.
::Megastorm smiles thinking that he had one up on his brother.  He had heard 
the story of how Galvatron had been overcome by a child::
Galvatron: Whats wrong with me Autojetter?
Autojetter: I believe Vulois has tapped into your mind somehow.
Galvatron: Can you fix it?
Autojetter: Only time can
Galvatron: Slag
